resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108745</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108745</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770201927</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Drug Information Consult</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Droge-Informationen Beraten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Information de Drogue Consultent</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A Informação Da Droga Consulta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le Informazioni Della Droga Si consultano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι πληροφορίες φαρμάκων συμβουλεύονται</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La Información De la Droga Consulta</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A short introduction on how to write a drug information consult. The module contains the following levels: Introduction to the DI Consult Steps to Writing a DI Consult Sections of the DI Consult Choosing Primary Literature Other Writing Tips Complete Assessment of the Drug Information Consult </string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine kurze Einleitung auf, wie man 
Drogeinformationen beraten schreibt. Das Modul enthält die 
folgenden Stufen: Einleitung zu den DI beraten Jobsteps zum 
Schreiben eines DI beraten Kapitel der DI beraten wählende 
Primärliteratur andere Schreiben Spitzen, die komplette Einschätzung
der Droge-Informationen beraten</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une introduction courte sur la façon dont écrire
une information de drogue consultent. Le module contient les 
niveaux suivants : L'introduction aux DI consultent des étapes 
à écrire un DI consultent des sections des DI consultent la 
littérature primaire de choix d'autres extrémités d'écriture 
l'évaluation que complète d'information de drogue consultent</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma introdução curta em como escrever uma 
informação da droga consulta. O módulo contem os seguintes 
níveis: A introdução aos DI consulta etapas a escrever um DI 
consulta seções dos DI consulta a literatura preliminar escolhendo 
outras pontas que da escrita a avaliação completa da informação da
droga consulta</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'introduzione corta su come redigere le 
informazioni della droga si consulta. Il modulo contiene i 
seguenti livelli: L'introduzione ai DI consulta i punti a 
scrivere un DI consulta le sezioni dei DI consulta la letteratura 
primaria di scelta altre punte che di scrittura la valutazione 
completa delle informazioni della droga si consulta</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια σύντομη εισαγωγή στο πώς να γράψει πληροφορίες 
φαρμάκων συμβουλεύεται. Η ενότητα περιέχει τα ακόλουθα 
επίπεδα: Η εισαγωγή στο DI Consult Steps στο γράψιμο
σε ένα DI Consult τμήματα της αρχικής λογοτεχνίας DI 
Consult Choosing άλλων ακρών γραψίματος πλήρης αξιολόγηση 
των πληροφοριών φαρμάκων συμβουλεύεται</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una introducción corta en cómo escribir una 
información de la droga consulta. El módulo contiene los 
niveles siguientes: La introducción a los DI consulta pasos de 
progresión a escribir un DI consulta las secciones de los DI consulta
la literatura primaria que elige otras extremidades de la escritura 
que el gravamen completo de la información de la droga consulta</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>

        </lifeCycle>

        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>

        </educational>
        <rights>

            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>

    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108745</entry>
    </identifier>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
